body.name: MSI PRO MP251 24.5-inch IPS 1920 x 1080 (FHD) Computer Monitor, 100Hz, Adaptive-Synch, HDMI, VGA Port, VESA Mountable, Tilt, Speaker, 1ms, Black

features: 25 inch Broadened Display – Enjoy the upgraded canvas in the limited space.
100 Hz refresh rate provides a better viewing experience with flicker-free image.
Maintain versatility across various devices by utilizing multiple input sources, such as HDMI and D-Sub(VGA) ports.
MSI EyesErgo technology with Anti-Flicker technology helps prevent eye strain and fatigue.
body.description: Upgrade your workspace and enjoy a better viewing experience with the PRO MP251 monitor. The PRO MP251 is a 24.5" IPS display and can sport a resolution of up to 1920 x 1080 (FHD). The 100Hz rate and 1ms (MPRT) / 4ms (GTG) time provides a smoother, better, viewing experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Flawless Flow, No More Stutters. 100HZ HIGH REFRESH RATE Attend the smoothest online conference call and show the perfect advertising video to customers with a 100Hz refresh rate. VESA's research shows that for 95% of users, 85Hz Refresh Rate has become a defacto standard for normal use that shows “flicker-free” images.
Same Space, Upgraded Canvas BROADENED DISPLAY - 24.5” SCREEN SIZE Upgrade your visual experience to a 24.5-inch display while maintaining a compact footprint.

MSI Eye Care Technology EYESERGO TECH, YOUR HEALTH PROTECTOR Optimize well-being and work eye ergo with our display's ergonomic design and eye care features. Enhanced comfort and promote healthier productivity. Tilt Adjustable & Tool Less Design Ergonomic Design The ergonomic design aims to enhance efficiency, comfort, and safety while reducing discomfort and the risk of injury. Vibrant Collaboration, Seamless Precision IPS PANEL 178° VIEWING ANGLE IPS panels enhance work with wide angles, accurate colors for collaboration, and assuring product colors. Promote productivity during extended sessions.

Empower Productivity CONCENTRATE YOUR EFFORT The 24.5-inch screen is the best size for most office and home use desks that optimally aligns with human visual focus, providing an immersive and ergonomic experience. VESA Mountable Unleash Connectivity With several practical designs including standard VESA Mount, Built-in Speakers, Stand with an accessory slot and complete I/O ports, the PRO MP251 Series is the caring assistant that boosts your productivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 24-Inch Sleek & Versatile Monitor - Enhancing Work and Play
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired a 24-inch monitor, and it has significantly improved my computing experience. The display offers crisp, vibrant colors, making it perfect for both work and entertainment. With full HD resolution, the image quality is sharp, providing an immersive experience whether I’m editing documents, watching videos, or gaming.The monitor’s slim design is sleek and modern, easily fitting into my workspace. The adjustable stand is a great feature, allowing me to find the perfect viewing angle. Additionally, the monitor boasts eye comfort technology, which reduces eye strain during long hours of use.In terms of connectivity, the monitor has multiple ports including HDMI and VGA, making it versatile for various setups. The response time is quick, eliminating any lag or ghosting, which is particularly noticeable when playing fast-paced games.One minor downside is the built-in speakers. While convenient, they don’t offer the best sound quality, but this is easily remedied with external speakers or headphones.Overall, this 24-inch monitor offers great value. Its combination of excellent display quality, ergonomic design, and reasonable price makes it a solid choice for anyone looking to upgrade their visual experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Compact and Affordable Monitor
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Crisp Full HD resolutionWide viewing angles with IPS panel75Hz refresh rate for smooth visualsAnti-glare technology reduces eye strainSlim bezels and adjustable stand for a sleek setupDecent connectivity options with HDMI and VGAVESA mount compatibilityCons:Lack of USB portsThe MSI Pro MP251 impresses with its stellar performance, sleek design, and user-friendly features. Ideal for work or play, it's a compact powerhouse that delivers a top-notch visual experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My first gaming monitor 25in is a manning colors are a little dim then my last but really dosent matter to much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: Excellent monitor for the price. This is exactly what I’m looking for. Perfect screen size that fits my desk, also adjustable stand is really useful so the height is comfortable for me while using it. In addition, picture quality and build quality are satisfying. It’s light enough and easy to set up. Very friendly for every type of users!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great value for such a nice monitor
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect monitor for me. I needed a relatively inexpensive monitor that would provide a nice clear sharp image for me to work with as a second monitor. I have it mounted on a Huanuo dual mounting bracket on my desk. I use the monitor vertically. I do a lot of reading off this monitor while working on the other. It's light. It was super simple to mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I grabbed this monitor for my father a couple of months ago when I bought him a new NUC style PC. He was still using a 4:3 aspect ratio, 22’ish inch monitor. The difference between that monitor and this one is night and day.The little PC box I got him mounted to the VESA mount of the monitor, so that was convenient. I didn’t even check if this had mounting capability when I purchased it. An affordable 1080p monitor with a VESA mount was just what I needed.I personally use two Dell 27” 4K monitors with a Mac Studio at home. My father doesn’t need anywhere near that kind of capability. The 1080p monitor (at 200 or 250% magnification in Windows) was perfect for him. I wouldn’t use this for hardcore gaming due to the refresh rate, but I am sure it could get by with older games or emulators. That said, it was perfect for my father’s needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great! MSI PRO MP251 monitor
reviews.reviewText: I am Totally impressed with this monitor. It had a 90% approval rating by other customers. The setup with easy, the image is amazing and colors vibrant and bright. I did Have to go into my settings on my Mac to set the refresh rate to 100mhz. It defaulted to 60. Overall extremely pleased with the MSI PRO MP251 Monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitors. Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these. They are for my Ham radio shack and are going on a 4 arm stand in the shack to display information in the shack and they are replacing to ASUS monitors that were old and had failed. One surprise was that they are 12V which is great in a Ham Shack. One monitor arrived with out the Power supply. After talking with Amazon and finding my only option was to send it back. I called MSI. It took a bit to get the right person but everyone I talked with at MSI worked to get me to the right person. Once contacted, I received an e-mail to obtain the reciept which was easily obtained from my Amazon order page. With this information, MSI, within a couple of days, sent me the missing power supply. They were great to work with. Highly recommend these monitors and if you do have issues, they will stand behind them.

First off, monitor is not 27” as it is advertised in the title, it’s only 24”.Secondly, the monitor doesn’t even work. i bought it to use as a second monitor in my setup. This monitor ended up not displaying any output. I tested with numerous cords, on three different pcs to no avail. Stay away and spend ur money elsewhere.

reviews.reviewTitle: Calidad precio, excelente para entrada o monitor secundario
reviews.reviewText: Lo compre por 2 razones, 1 que esta excelente por el precio, no vi mas baratos con las prestaciones que ofrece, 2 las caracteristicas que ofrece, es panel IPS a 100Hz, la calidad es muy buena, sabiendo que es MSI, sinceramente lo recomiendo mucho para quienes no quieran gastar mucho en un monitor de entrada para gaming, aunque el tiempo de respuesta sea alto, aun asi que sea IPS reduce el ghosting, en mi caso solo lo uso como monitor secundario que va muy bien para mis necesidades, altamente recomendable.
Se siente de buena calidad, y buena imagen
Perfect size for office work, 1920x1080 resolution looks great for 25"
El monitor es asombroso, buenos colores, facil de armar y con una tasa de refresco de 100hzEso si, solo se puede conectar con HDMI
